channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Joni Jet
channel.desc: Mae Joni a Jini yn cyfnewid cyrff ar ddamwain! Gyda drwgweithredwyr angen eu dal, maen nhw'n dysgu meistroli eu sgiliau ei gilydd! Joni and Jini accidentally switch bodies.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Byd Tad-cu
channel.desc: 'Pam bod gyda ni goed?' yw cwestiwn Meg heddiw. Mae gan Tad-cu ateb doniol am y Brenin Boliog oedd ar d?n eisiau mynd i barti pen-blwydd Tywysoges. Today Meg asks 'What are trees for.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Blociau Rhif
channel.desc: Hwyl a sbri i blant ifanc gyda'r blociau rhif. Fun and games for young children with the number blocks.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Twt
channel.desc: Mae Cen Twyn wrthi'n trwsio corn Twt ac yn addo y bydd yn swnllyd iawn. Cen Twyn is repairing Twt's funnel and has promised Twt that once repaired it will be louder than ever.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Cacamwnci
channel.desc: Mae Cacamwnci yn ?l gyda mwy o sgetsys dwl a doniol, a chymeriadau newydd sbon fel Clem Clocsio, Myrddin y Dewin a Vanessa drws nesa! Cacamwnci is back with more funny and silly sketches.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Blero yn Mynd i Ocido
channel.desc: Mae cysylltydd S?an ar goll ac mae Blero'n helpu'i ffrindiau i ddod o hyd iddo, yn y ganolfan ailgylchu! The monster helps his friends find S?an's lost connector in the recycling centre.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Amser Maith Maith yn ?l
channel.desc: Rhaglen lle gallwn ddysgu mwy am gyfnodau arall ar hyd y canrifoedd. A programme in which we learn more about different periods in history.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Newyddion S4C
channel.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Ffasiwn Drefn
channel.desc: Y tro hwn, cwpwrdd dillad Meinir Williams Jones o Ynys M?n sy'n cael ei drawsnewid. This week we'll be decluttering and transforming Meinir Williams Jones's wardrobe in Anglesey.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Heno
channel.desc: Rhaglen gylchgrawn nosweithiol gyda straeon o bob cwr o Gymru. Nightly magazine with stories from all over Wales and special guests.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Ralio
channel.desc: Uchafbwyntiau seithfed rownd Pencampwriaeth Rali'r Byd o Rali'r Acropolis Groeg. Highlights of the seventh round of the World Rally Championship from the Greek Acropolis Rally.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Garddio a Mwy
channel.desc: Yn Lluarth yr Onnen, Adam sy'n taclo jobsus tymhorol, tra bo Sioned yn picio i feithrinfa Claire Austin yn y Drenewydd. Meinir builds a water feature suitable for any garden, large or small.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Newyddion S4C
channel.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Prynhawn Da
channel.desc: Cyfres gylchgrawn gydag eitemau coginio a ffasiwn a chyngor am bopeth o addurno'ch cartref i ddewis llyfr da. Magazine series including features on fashion, style, antiques and cookery.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Newyddion S4C
channel.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Stori'r Iaith
channel.desc: Elis James sy'n darganfod mwy am yr ymgyrchu cythryblus dros hawliau'r iaith yn yr 20fed ganrif. Comedian Elis James visits the Basque Country to find out how they reached 1million speakers.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Timpo
channel.desc: Pan mae Taid Po yn symud i ystafell mewn twr uchel, mae'n gweld colled clywed cerddoriaeth hyfryd un o'r Plant Po. Grampa Po misses the sweet music played by the Kid Po on the ground floor.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Twm Twrch
channel.desc: Mae'r Garddwr yn cyflwyno ei hoff gem i Twm Twrch a Dorti, sef Golff. Ond gyda rheolau newydd! The Gardener introduces his favourite game to Twm Twrch and Dorti - golf.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Fferm Fach
channel.desc: Mae Cai a Megan yn edrych ymlaen at barti Calan Gaeaf, ond does dim pwmpen gyda nhw. eto. Cai and Megan are looking forward to a Halloween party, but they don't yet have a pumpkin.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Pentre Papur Pop
channel.desc: Ar yr antur popwych heddiw mae Pip a'i ffrindiau'n mynd ar helfa stori tylwyth teg! On today's poptastic adventure, Zip and the friends are going on a fairy tale scavenger hunt.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Annibendod
channel.desc: Mae Anni a Lili yn cael trafferth efo'r seinydd clyfar ac yn archebu pethau annisgwyl wrth geisio holi am gerddoraieth. Anni and LIli are having trouble with the smart speaker.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Larfa
channel.desc: Y tro hwn, mae'r cymeriadau dwl yn ystyried bywyd llygoden fawr. This time, the crazy characters consider the life of a rat.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Dennis a Dannedd
channel.desc: Hwyl a sbri gyda'r direidus Dennis a Dannedd. Fun and games with the mischievous Dennis and Gnashers.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Bwystfil
channel.desc: Cyfrif 10 anifail du a gwyn sy'n profi nad oes angen lliwiau llachar i ddenu sylw. We count down 10 black and white beasts who prove you don't need bright colours to attract attention.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: LEGO? DREAMZzz
channel.desc: Mae'r Cwsgarwyr yn herio gorchymyn ac yn sleifio allan o Gastell y Fagddu i ddilyn y gigfr?n. On the hunt for their missing memories, the dream chasers defy orders and escape the castle.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Newyddion Ni
channel.desc: Newyddion i bobl ifanc. News programmes for youngsters.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Arfordir Cymru
channel.desc: Bydd Bedwyr yn teithio o Aberystwyth i Aberaeron. Bedwyr looks at the political undertones of maps and sees ancient land boundaries. He also enjoys a trip down Memory Lane in Aberarth.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Rownd a Rownd
channel.desc: Mae Anna'n credu ei bod wedi llwyddo i gael gwared o'i phroblem efo Miles, ond daw cwestiynau anodd. As Elen makes last minute preparations for the inspection an unexpected situation arises.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Heno
channel.desc: Rhaglen gylchgrawn nosweithiol gyda straeon o bob cwr o Gymru. Nightly magazine with stories from all over Wales and special guests.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Newyddion S4C
channel.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Pobol y Cwm
channel.desc: Ceisia Dani adeiladu pontydd rhwng Britt a Colin, ac mae Eleri'n bendefynol o ymyrryd yn y Carnival. Eleri tries to interfere in the carnival, and refuses to take no for an answer.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Hafiach
channel.desc: Wedi datganiad yr heddlu gadarnhau be ddigwyddodd i'r corff ma'r criw'n amau rhan Aabis ym mhopeth. Following the police statement the gang begin to question Aabis' role in the death.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Newyddion S4C
channel.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Queensland Reds v Y Llewod
channel.desc: Uchafbwyntiau g?m Queensland Reds v Y Llewod Prydeinig a Gwyddelig ar Daith y Llewod. Stadiwm Suncorp, Brisbane. Highlights of the Lions' Tour's Queesland Reds v British & Irish Lions game.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Trysorau'r Teulu
channel.desc: Y tro hwn: sbectol opera, hen ffr?m ffoto a ph?r o greigiau addurniadol. John Rees and Sian Astley are back on the road unearthing family treasures, including a pair of opera glasses.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Hansh
channel.desc: DJ Radio 1 Vick Hope sy'n ymweld ag Aberaeron, Aelwyd Pantycelyn a Gwersyll yr Urdd Llangrannog yng nghwmni Miriam ac Eadyth Crawford. Radio 1 DJ Vick Hope gets acquainted with Wales.
